author: Michelle Moons
description: Vice President Mike Pence challenged the 2017 graduates of Grove City College to lead with courage in the face of criticism and seeming setbacks.
title: Mike Pence to Grove City Grads: Persist Fearlessly in the Face of Criticism - Breitbart

author: Ben Kew
description: Over 100 students at the University of Notre Dame walked out of a commencement address given by Mike Pence, according to local reports.
title: Notre Dame Students Walk Out of Mike Pence Commencement Address - Breitbart

author: Maureen Groppe, Fredreka Schouten, Tony Cook
description: For someone who’s one heartbeat away from the presidency, Mike Pence has somehow managed to stay arm’s length from the multiplying controversies. Can it last?
title: Can Mike Pence escape the controversies engulfing the White House?

author: Pam Key
description: Watch: Notre Dame Students Walk Out on VP Mike Pence Graduation Speech
title: Watch: Notre Dame Students Walk Out on VP Mike Pence Graduation Speech - Breitbart

description: Vice President Mike Pence is standing by a March statement that he first learned of Michael Flynn's ties to Turkey from media reports, despite revelations President Trump's transition team was made aware far earlier.
title: What did Mike Pence know about Flynn?  - CNN Video

author: Spiegel Online
description: Stummer Protest: Als US-Vizepräsident Mike Pence an einer Universität in seinem Heimatstaat Indiana eine Rede hielt, wollten Dutzende Absolventen nicht zuhören. Demonstrativ verließen sie den Festakt.
title: US-Vizepräsident: Mike Pence hält Rede - Studenten verlassen Saal

author: Michelle Moons
description: Vice President Mike Pence received applause on Sunday despite a small pre-planned protest as he spoke to thousands of Notre Dame graduates.
title: Mike Pence Applauded for Lauding Free Speech at Notre Dame Commencement Despite Walkouts - Breitbart

author: ABC News
description:
A group of graduating seniors from the University of Notre Dame turned their backs on their own graduation ceremony in protest of Vice President Mike Pence, who gave their commencement address there on Sunday.
The protests, which were organized by a student activist group at Notre Dame called We...
title: Notre Dame students walk out on Mike Pence during commencement speech

author: https://www.facebook.com/wgnnews
description:
When Vice President Mike Pence delivers the commencement speech at Notre Dame on Sunday, he'll likely speak to fewer people than he expected.

Some students at the Catholic university plan to walk out of the speech as part of a protest against Pence and his policies, which they say target marginalized people on the basis of their religion, skin color or sexual orientation, according to the student activist group We Stand For.
title: Notre Dame students plan walkout during Mike Pence commencement speech

author: FOCUS Online
description: Dutzende Studenten haben im US-Bundesstaat Indiana aus Protest gegen Vizepräsident Mike Pence ihre eigene Abschlussfeier verlassen. Von den anwesenden Kommilitonen gibt es geteilte Reaktionen.
title: Bei Rede an US-Universität: Als Mike Pence ans Pult tritt, bekommt er die ganze Wut über Trumps Politik zu spüren
